#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main() {
  cout.setf(ios::fixed);
  cout.precision(8);
  int t;
  cin >> t;
  while (t--) {
    int n;
    cin >> n;
    int opt = -1, ans = -1;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
      int cur = 0;
      for (int j = 0; j < n; ++j) {
        int x;
        cin >> x;
        cur += x;
      }
      if (cur > opt) {
        opt = cur;
        ans = i;
      }
    }
    if (n == 1) cout << 0 << ' ' << 1 << endl;
    else cout << (opt == n - 1 ? 1 : 2) << ' ' << ans + 1 << endl;
  }
}
